goal.en: Enable students to understand the vibration diagnosis and control
goal.ch: 讓學生了解振動之診斷與防治

content.en:
Course Contents ( 課程大綱 ):
1. Fundamentals of Vibration
2. Free Vibration of Single Degree of Freedom Systems 3. Harmonically Excited Vibration
4. Vibration Under General Forcing Conditions
5. Two Degree of Freedom Systems
6. Multi-degree of Freedom Systems
7. Determination of Natural Frequencies and Mode Shapes
8. Vibration Control
9. Machine Malfunction Diagnosis
content.ch:
Course Contents ( 課程大綱 ):
1. 振動原理
2. 一階自由度振動
3. 簡諧外力振動
4. 一般外力振動
5. 二階自由度振動
6. 多階自由度振動
7. 自然頻率及模態
8. 振動控制
9. 機器故障診斷

textbook.en:
"Textbook ( 教科書 ):
classnote
Reference books( 參考書 ):
1.Mechanical Vibrations, by Singiresu S. Rao, 4th edition, Prentice Hall.
2. A. Dimarogonas, Vibration for Engineers, (2 nd ed.), Prentice-Hall, Upper Saddle River , NJ , 1996.
3. J. D. Irwin, E. R. Graf, Industrial Noise and Vibration Control, Prentice-Hall, 1979."
textbook.ch:

grading.ch:
Grading ( 評分 )
1.期中考40%
2.期末考 40%
3.出席 20%

en.competency: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation

en: Department:MSc(Adult Learning) in Mechanical Engineering only.
ch: 系所:限機械工程學系碩士在職專班。
